--- title: "Yield Distribution" format: html: toc: true --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # -- Configure repo + assets (EDIT these paths) repo_user <- "jaeseokh" repo_name <- "yield_distribution" branch <- "main" figure_path <- "results/figures/main_figure.png" table_path <- "results/tables/summary.csv" base_raw <- sprintf("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/%s/%s/%s/", repo_user, repo_name, branch) url_fig <- paste0(base_raw, figure_path) url_tbl <- paste0(base_raw, table_path) ``` ::: ::: {.hero-mini} # Why it matters Means hide risk. Managers need the **whole distribution** to price decisions. ::: ## At a glance * **Main problem**: Averages understate tail risk. * **Main question**: How do N × weather shift moments/tails? * **Finding / limitation**: Tails respond differently; calibration ongoing. * **Long‑term solution & goal**: Central/raw‑moment regressions → MaxEnt densities. ## Key Result ### Main Figure ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} knitr::include_graphics(url_fig) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![Latest main figure from the repo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jaeseokh/yield_distribution/main/results/figures/main_figure.png) ::: ::: **Takeaway:** Two sentences about risk‑sensitive insights from the figure. ### Main Table (top lines) ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(readr); library(dplyr) try({ tbl <- read_csv(url_tbl, show_col_types = FALSE) head(tbl, 8) }, silent = TRUE) ``` ::: **Takeaway:** Two sentences on moment shifts and implications. ## Workflow Roadmap
Moment models
MaxEnt
Backtests
Docs
## Tech & Data **Tech**: R, MaxEnt, NB/GLM, CAR **Data**: OFPE + weather/soil features.
GitHub Repository
```
